meanings.definition: Relating to the upper regions of space.
meanings.sent1: The stars in the etheric sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: The astronauts marveled at the etheric beauty of the cosmos.
meanings.sent3: The etheric clouds seemed to dance playfully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared through the etheric expanse of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The etheric realm above us holds endless mysteries.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ether.
meanings.sent1: The etheric waves carried the signal across the airwaves.
meanings.sent2: The radio waves traveled through the etheric medium effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The etheric connection between the devices was flawless.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed in the etheric space of the room.
meanings.sent5: The etheric energy flowed through the room, unseen but powerful.

meanings.sent1: The etheric mist floated gently above the lake.
meanings.sent2: Her laughter had an etheric quality, light and airy.
meanings.sent3: The etheric nature of the bubbles made them disappear quickly.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts drifted in an etheric haze of contemplation.
meanings.sent5: The etheric music filled the room with a sense of weightlessness.
